use.flag: Add support for link-time optimizations (unsupported, use at your own risk).

pkgmetadata.longdescription: GNAT, the (GN)U (A)da (T)oolchain, is a high performance Ada 95 development environment based on the mature GCC compiler technology. It implements the full Ada 95 language defined by the ISO standard and is upward compatible with Ada 83. This is an FSF supported version, integrated with gcc.
